dialogues.Perky:
[1]I'm sure you won't find Padua any different than your old school.  Same little asswipe mother-fuckers everywhere. 
[2] 
[3]Then go forth.  Scoot   I've got deviants to see. 
[4] 
[5]It says here you exposed yourself to a group of freshmen girls. 
[6]With the teeth of your zipper? 
[7]Katarina Stratford.  My, my.  You've been terrorizing Ms. Blaise again. 
[8]Well, yes, compared to your other choices of expression this year, today's events are quite mild.  By the way, Bobby Rictor's gonad retrieval operation went quite well, in case you're interested. 
[9]The point is Kat -- people perceive you as somewhat ... 
[10]No ... I believe "heinous bitch" is the term used most often. 
[11] 
[12] Patrick sits before Miss Perky, eating his Thai food  
[13] 
[14]I'm at a loss, then.  What should we talk about? Your year of absence? 
[15]Why don't we discuss your driving need to be a hemorrhoid? 
[16]You weren't abused, you aren't stupid, and as far as I can tell, you're only slightly psychotic -- so why is it that you're such a fuck-up? 
[17]Fine.  Go do something repugnant and give us something to talk about next week. 
[18] Kat sits outside waiting for her appointment, bored and annoyed.  The door opens and Miss Perky escorts Patrick out  
[19]You're completely demented. 
[20]You two know each other?  
[21] 
[22]Ladies?  Shall we take a trip to my office? 
[23] Miss Perky stares at both sisters as they sit before her, then focuses on Bianca.  
[24]So you're the real bitch 
[25] 
[26]Just smack her now. 
[27]What, no hug?
dialogues.Stratford:
[1] SHARON STRATFORD, attractive and focused, sits in front of her computer, typing quickly.   A shelf next to her holds several bodice-ripper romance novels, bearing her name.  Kat stands behind her, reading over her shoulder as she types.  
[2] Kat washes her face at the sink.  Bianca appears behind her, and attempts to twist Kat's hair into a chignon.  She wacks Bianca away.  
[3] Walter paces as Kat sits calmly on the couch.  
[4] The lights are on, illuminating the yard  
[5] Bianca and Chastity stand outside Kat's room.  MUSIC is blaring and the door is shut.  Bianca looks at her watch  
[6] Patrick pulls up in Kat's driveway.  Their paint wardrobe has dried by now and they look like refugees from some strange, yet colorful, war.  
[7] Kat stands at the sink, scrubbing paint off of her face Bianca TAPS on the open door.  
[8] Sharon is at her computer, Walter at his exercise bike  
[9] A sprinkler cruises the lawn.  
[10] Kat is sprawled on the couch in sweats, wrapped in a blanket, watching "Sixteen Candles".  When Molly Ringwald leans across the birthday cake to get a kiss from her dream date, Kat changes the channel disgustedly, settling for an infomercial  The phone sits next to her.  Not ringing.  Bianca breezes in, bearing a cup of tea.  
[11] We hear the sounds of MUSIC and LAUGHTER.  
[12] Patrick is at the barbecue grill, flipping burgers.  Kat watches.

dialogues.Bogey:
[1] BOGEY, a short Future MBA in a tux, greets his guests like a pro, handing out cigars and martinis.  
[2]Nice to see you.  Martini bar to the right, shots in the kitchen. 
[3] Joey lines up a row of shots amid much whooping and hollering within the jock crowd.  Kat enters, then quickly tries to make an about face.  Joey sees her and rushes over to block her, standing in the doorway.  
[4] Cameron and Michael enter.  Cameron looks, around for his beloved, while Michael schmoozee with all in attendance and dishes dirt simultaneously.  
[5] Kat and a crowd of White Rastas and Cowboys stand in a drunken group hug singing "I Shot the Sheriff".  Kat has another shot glass in hand.  Patrick is showing a scar to an inebriated, enraptured cheerleader.  He looks up at Kat and smiles meets his eyes then looks away.  
[6] Bianca stands next to Joey, sipping from her beer  
[7] Bianca shuts the door and leans on it with a sigh.  Chastity applies lip-gloss in the mirror.  
[8] Patrick tries to remove a shot glass from Kat's hand.  
[9] As Patrick walks Kat through the dining room, Cameron  grabs his arm.  CAMERON We need to talk.  
[10] Patrick marches Kat around the yard, holding her up  
[11] Kat washes her face and grabs a bottle of Scope, taking a big swig.  A KNOCK sounds at the door  
[12] Kids loiter on the lawn.  Bianca and Chastity walk outside Joey catches up to them.
